Verses: 1 appozhudhu Sabaiyaar Ellaarum Kookkuralittup Pulambinaargal; Janangal Andru Raamuzhudhum Azhudhukondirundhaargal.

2 isravel Puththirar Ellaarum Mosekkum Aaronukkum Virodhamaaga Murumuruththaargal. Sabaiyaar Ellaarum Avargalai Nokki: Egipthudhesaththile Seththupponomaanaal Nalamaayirukkum; Indha Vanaandharaththile Naangal Seththaalum Nalam.

3 naangal Pattayaththaal Madiyumpadikkum, Engal Penjaadhigalum Pillaigalaiyum Kollaiyaagumpadikkum, Karththar Engalai Indha Dhesaththukkuk Konduvandhadhu Enna? Egipthukkuth Thirumbippogiradhe Engalukku Uththamam Allavo Endraargal.
4 pinbu Avargal: Naam Oru Thalaivanai Erpaduththikkondu Egipthukkuth Thirumbippovom Vaarungal Endru Oruvarodoruvar Sollikkondaargal.
5 appozhudhu Moseyum Aaronum Isravel Puththirarin Sabaiyaaraagiya Ellaak Koottaththaarukku Munbaagavum Mugankuppura Vizhundhaargal.
6 dhesaththai Sutrippaarththavargalil Noonin Kumaaranaagiya Yosuvaavum, Eppunneyin Kumaaranaagiya Kaalepum, Thangal Vasthirangalaik Kizhiththukkondu,
7 isravel Puththirarin Samastha Sabaiyaiyum Nokki: Naangal Poi Sutrippaarththu Sodhiththa Dhesam Magaa Nalladhesam.
8 karththar Nammel Piriyamaayirundhaal, Andha Dhesaththile Nammaik Kondupoi, Paalum Thenum Odugira Andha Dhesaththai Namakkuk Koduppaar.

9 karththarukku Virodhamaagamaaththiram Kalagampannaadhirungal; Andha Dhesaththin Janangalukku Neengal Bayappadavendiyadhillai; Avargal Namakku Iraiyaavaargal; Avargalaik Kaaththa Nizhal Avargalai Vittu Vilagippoyitru; Karththar Nammode Irukkiraar; Avargalukkup Bayappadavendiyadhillai Endraargal.
10 appozhudhu Avargalmel Kalleriyavendum Endru Sabaiyaar Ellaarum Sonnaargal; Udane Karththarudaiya Magimai Aasarippuk Koodaaraththil Isravel Puththirar Ellaarukkum Munbaagak Kaanappattadhu.

11 karththar Moseyai Nokki: Edhuvaraikkum Indha Janangal Enakkuk Kobam Undaakkuvaargal? Thangalukkulle Naan Kaattina Sagala Adaiyaalangalaiyum Avargal Kandum, Edhuvaraikkum Ennai Visuvaasiyaadhiruppaargal?
12 naan Avargalaik Kollai Noyinaal Vaadhiththu, Sudhandharaththukkup Purambaakkippottu, Avargalaippaarkkilum Unnaip Peridhum Balaththadhumaana Jaadhiyaakkuven Endraar.
13 mose Karththarai Nokki: Egipthiyar Idhaik Ketpaargal; Avargal Naduvilirundhu Ummudaiya Vallamaiyinaale Indha Janangalaik Konduvandheere.

14 karththaraagiya Neer Indha Janangalin Naduve Irukkiradhaiyum, Karththaraagiya Neer Mugamugamaai Dharisanamaakiradhaiyum, Ummudaiya Megam Ivargalmel Nirkiradhaiyum, Pagalil Megaththoonilum, Iravil Akkiniththoonilum, Neer Ivargalukku Mun Sellugiradhaiyum Kettirukkiraargal, Indha Dhesaththin Kudigalukkum Solluvaargal.
15 ore Manidhanaik Kollugiradhupola Indha Janangalaiyellaam Neer Kolveeraanaal, Appozhudhu Ummudaiya Keerththiyaik Kettirukkum Purajaadhiyaar:
16 karththar Andha Janangalukkuk Koduppom Endru Aanaiyittirundha Dhesaththile Avargalaik Kondupoi Vidak Koodaadheponapadiyinaal, Avargalai Vanaandharaththile Kondrupottaar Enbaargale.

17 aagaiyaal Karththar Neediya Saandhamum Migundha Kirubaiyumullavar Endrum, Akkiramaththaiyum Meerudhalaiyum Mannikkiravarendrum, Kutramullavargalaik Kutramatravargalaaga Vidaamal, Pidhaakkal Seydha Akkiramaththaip Pillaigalidaththil Moondraam Naangaam Thalaimuraimattum Visaarikkiravar Endrum, Neer Solliyirukkirapadiye,
18 en Aandavarudaiya Vallamai Peridhaai Vilanguvadhaaga.

19 umadhu Kirubaiyinudaiya Magaththuvaththinpadiyeyum, Egipthai Vittadhumudhal Innaalvaraikkum Indha Janangalukku Manniththuvandhadhinpadiyeyum, Indha Janangalin Akkiramaththai Manniththarulum Endraan.
20 appozhudhu Karththar: Un Vaarththaiyinpadiye Manniththen.
21 boomiyellaam Karththarudaiya Magimaiyinaal Niraindhirukkum Endru Ennudaiya Jeevanaikkondu Sollugiren.

22 en Magimaiyaiyum, Naan Egipthilum Vanaandharaththilum Seydha En Adaiyaalangalaiyum Kandirundhum, En Saththaththukku Sevikodaamal, Idhanode Paththumurai Ennaip Pareetchai Paarththa Manidharil Oruvarum,
23 avargal Pidhaakkalukku Naan Aanaiyittukkoduththa Dhesaththaik Kaanamaattaargal; Enakkuk Kobam Undaakkinavargalil Oruvarum Adhaikkaanamaattaargal.

24 ennudaiya Dhaasanaagiya Kaalep Vere Aaviyai Udaiyavanaayirukkirapadiyinaalum, Uththamamaai Ennaip Pinpatrivandhapadiyinaalum, Avan Poivandhadhesaththile Avanai Serappannuven; Avan Sandhadhiyaar Adhai Sudhandhariththukkolluvaargal.
25 amalekkiyarum Kaanaaniyarum Pallaththaakkile Kudiyirukkirapadiyinaal, Naalaikku Neengal Thirumbi Sivandha Samuththiraththukkup Pogira Vazhiyaai Vanaandharaththukkup Prayaanampannungal Endraar.
26 pinnum Karththar Moseyaiyum Aaronaiyum Nokki:
27 enakku Virodhamaai Murumurukkira Indhap Pollaadha Sabaiyaarai Edhuvaraikkum Poruppen? Isravel Puththirar Enakku Virodhamaai Murumurukkiradhaik Ketten.
28 nee Avargalode Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Neengal En Sevigal Ketka Sonnapragaaram Ungalukku Seyven Enbadhai En Jeevanaikkondu Sollugiren Endru Karththar Uraikkiraar.

29 indha Vanaandharaththil Ungal Predhangal Vizhum; Ungalil Irubadhu Vayadhumudhal Adharku Merpattavargalaaga Ennappattu, Ungal Thogaikku Utpattavargalum Enakku Virodhamaai Murumuruththirukkiravargalumaagiya Anaivarin Predhangalum Vizhum.
30 eppunneyin Kumaaran Kaalepum, Noonin Kumaaran Yosuvaavum Thavira, Matravargalaagiya Neengal Naan Ungalaik Kudiyetruven Endru Aanaiyittukkoduththa Dhesaththil Pravesippadhillai.
31 kollaiyaavaargal Endru Neengal Sonna Ungal Kuzhandhaigalaiyo Naan Adhil Pravesikka Seyven; Neengal Asattaippannina Dhesaththai Avargal Kandarivaargal.
32 ungal Predhangalo Indha Vanaandharaththile Vizhum.
33 avaigal Vanaandharaththile Vizhundhu Theerumattum, Ungal Pillaigal Naarpadhuvarusham Vanaandharaththile Thirindhu, Neengal Sorampona Paadhagaththai Sumappaargal.

34 neengal Dhesaththai Sutrippaarththa Naarpadhunaal Ilakkaththinpadiye, Ovvoru Naal Ovvoru Varushamaaga, Neengal Naarpadhu Varusham Ungal Akkiramangalai Sumandhu, En Udanpadikkaikku Vandha Maarudhalai Unaruveergal.

35 karththaraagiya Naan Idhai Sonnen; Enakku Virodhamaaik Koottankoodina Indhap Pollaadha Sabaiyaar Yaavarukkum Ippadiye Seyven; Indha Vanaandharaththile Azhivaargal, Inge Saavaargal Endru Sol Endraar.
36 andha Dhesaththai Sodhiththuppaarkkumpadi Moseyaal Anuppappattuth Thirumbi, Andha Dhesaththaikkuriththuth Dhurchcheydhi Konduvandhu,
37 sabaiyaar Ellaarum Avanukku Virodhamaai Murumurukkumpadi Andha Dhurchcheydhiyai Sonnavargalaagiya Andha Manidhar Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Vaadhaiyinaal Seththaargal.
38 dhesaththai Sutrippaarkkappona Andha Manidharil Noonin Kumaaranaagiya Yosuvaavum, Eppunneyin Kumaaranaagiya Kaalepummaaththiram Uyirodirundhaargal.
39 mose Indha Vaarththaigalai Isravel Puththirar Anaivarodum Sonnapodhu, Janangal Migavum Dhukkiththaargal.
40 adhikaalame Avargal Ezhundhirundhu: Naangal Paavancheydhom, Karththar Vaakkuththaththampannina Idaththukku Naangal Povom Endru Solli Malaiyin Uchchiyil Eraththunindhaargal.
41 mose Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Ippadi Karththarin Kattalaiyai Meerugiradhenna? Adhu Ungalukku Vaaikkaadhu.
42 neengal Ungal Saththurukkalukku Munbaaga Muriya Adikkappadaadhapadikku Erippogaadhirungal; Karththar Ungal Naduvil Iraar.
43 amalekkiyarum Kaanaaniyarum Ange Ungalukkumunne Irukkiraargal; Pattayaththinaal Vizhuveergal; Neengal Karththarai Vittup Pinvaanginapadiyaal, Karththarungalode Irukkamaattaar Endraan.
44 aanaalum Avargal Malaiyin Uchchiyil Erath Thunindhaargal; Karththarudaiyaudanpadikkaiyin Pettiyum Moseyum Paalayaththai Vittup Pogavillai.
45 appozhudhu Amalekkiyarum Kaanaaniyarum Andha Malaiyile Irundhu Irangivandhu, Avargalai Muriya Adiththu, Avargalai Ormaamattum Thuraththinaargal.
